Red_LL - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.GameParameters
This variable stores the lower left hand corner of the red zone.
Red_UR - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.GameParameters
This variable stores the upper right hand corner of the red zone.
RedCorner - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.GameParameters
This variable stores the starting corner for the red team, possible values are [0,3].
RedTeam - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.GameParameters
This variable stores the team starting out from the red zone, possible values are [1,20].
retrieveRing() - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.threads.RingSearcher
this method retrieve the searched ring
RGBPoller - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.threads
This class polls a light sensor that is used to detect colored rings.
RGBPoller(SampleProvider[], float[][], SensorData) - Constructor for class ca.mcgill.ecse211.threads.RGBPoller
This constructor creates an instance of the RGBPoller class to provide color data from an light sensor to our robot.
rightMotor - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Game
Motor object instance that allows control of the right motor connected to port D
RingMotorTest() - Static method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.tests.ComponentTest
Test for ring detection
RingSearcher - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.threads
This class helps our robot to search for rings on a grid itself as a thread will search and retrieve the rings
RingSearcher(EV3LargeRegulatedMotor, EV3MediumRegulatedMotor) - Constructor for class ca.mcgill.ecse211.threads.RingSearcher
This class provides method to check if there is a ring and if the ring is the color we want
rodMotor - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Game

rotate(int) - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Navigation
Rotate the robot by certain angle
run() - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.odometer.Odometer
This method is called when our Odometer object is started as a thread and begins to keep track of motor rotations
run() - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.odometer.OdometryCorrection
When this thread starts, it will correct the rotation and position of the robot once a blackline is detected
run() - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Display
This method is called when the Display thread is started.
run() - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.threads.GyroPoller
This method is called by a UltrasonicPoller (Thread) instance when it is asked to start executing Sensors now return floats using a uniform protocol.
run() - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.threads.ThreadControl
run method implemented from Runnable class, this run method implements the functionality to pause and restart the thread
